description:
Do you have a hobby or interest?

Have you every passed an exam?

Have you ever overcome a challenge or achieved a goal?

Have you ever passed a job interview?

I bet you have, and in doing so you learned some cool stuff which would save other people valuable time and possibly money. In just a few hours you could easily create a mini-membership site teaching other people how to do exactly what you did.

You don't need any technical skills and most website hosting companies will let you host your domain for under $4 per month including unlimited bandwidth. The beauty of mini-membership sites is that once you go live, they keep paying you while you sleep and of course there is no limit to how many you can create.

Let the Lazy Slob show you how he managed to create lucrative mini-membership sites which allow him to lie in till past 11am every morning.

The Lazy Slob
title: 5 Days to a Mini-Membership Site
